name: places/ChIJY-j2iQ72wokRNlCb_T_PW7k
adrFormatAddress: 1492 5th Ave, New York, NY 10035, USA

originalText.text: So once again the price has gone up on the dryers. I can completely understand having to raise cost due to inflation but if you're going to do so atleast clean the machines(there shouldn't be such a ridiculous amount of mold). Cover the outlet in the bathroom, clean the dust off of the ceiling fans and if you can't just cut them off so the dust isn't flying around. And last but surely not least remove the sign that says FREE SOAP MON-FRI. Telling the customer you just started this week isn't an excuse as you could have posted a note on the door alongside the other notices. But instead there is no signs posted outside or inside the establishment.

originalText.text: Lovely staff and powerful dryers. Seamless pay options, including card, and pleasant atmosphere

text.text: Lovely staff and powerful dryers. Seamless pay options, including card, and pleasant atmosphere

originalText.text: I’ve been coming here in and off for about 2 years I stopped going because the last lady who worked there was rude and arrogant. Recently I made a trip there and it was honestly the best one yet! This girl was friendly and accommodating didn’t even complain that I stayed and they wanted to closing. I will be returning hopefully she stays. 4 different size machines small ones not very deep but big ones get the job done. Price went up( but of course) dryers are mediocre.

originalText.text: Still waiting for a call back from the manager for 3 weeks now.  Anna who answers the phone is so rude, disrespectful, unprofessional and "too busy to come out" even though she was fine to come out and speak with other customers before. It appears they have a big customer service issue, and the workers charge whatever price they want in terms of dry cleaning depending on their mood; to the point when I came to collect my items, one of the workers asked me why I was charged so much. Only good worker is the one who works in the evenings. Will not be using this laundromat anymore

originalText.text: This place is convenient, but that's pretty much the only good thing about them.  They consistently fail to follow instructions for our laundry (how many times/ways do I have to ask you not to use fabric softener or dryer sheets?).  Dry cleaning is very inconsistent - we've had clothes come back with stains and even bits of food still stuck on them.  One dry cleaning order came back and all the clothes were so stiff they could stand on their own, then the next week the clothes came back seeming like they hadn't really been cleaned at all.  I wanted to have a cotton shirt of mine washed with my husband's - not dry cleaned - and they said they wouldn't do it wash & press because it's a women's shirt.  The service here is very disappointing and I don't plan to continue giving them my business.
